pages.text: Negative modifiers influence the Vault to the player's $(l)disadvantage$().$(br2)Which negative modifiers occur during a Vault $(l)can't$() be controlled by the player.

pages.title: Negative Vault Modifiers
pages.text: $(br)These can roll $(l)at random$() within an $(l)unmodified$() Vault.$(br2)Additionally, these can roll on Vaults with Afterlife applied to it.$(br2)Some modifiers may also roll as a consequence of $(l:game_mechanics/crystal_modification#vault_catalysts)$(t:Vault Catalysts)$(l)Vault Catalysts$() applied on a Vault Crystal.

pages.title: Mob Modifiers
pages.text: Mob modifiers affect the mobs within Vaults.$(br2)One may summon mobs when entering a room, while another $(l)increases$() their $(l)damage$() dealt.

pages.title: Mob Modifiers
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Wild$()$(li2)+1 Set Wildly Spawned Mobs$(br)$(li)$(l)Chunky Mobs$()$(li2)+10% Mob Health$(br)$(li)$(l)Furious$()$(li2)+10% Mob Damage$(br)$(li)$(l)Rapid Mobs$()$(li2)+5% Mob Speed

pages.title: Other Modifiers
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Shortened$()$(li2)-1 Minute Vault Time$(br)$(li)$(l)Frail$()$(li2)+20% Durability Damage$(br)$(li)$(l)Trapped$()$(li2)+5% Chest Trap Chance

pages.title: Other Modifiers
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Draining$()$(li2)-10% Mana Regeneration$(br)$(li)$(l)Velara's Wrath$()$(li2)-20% Healing Efficiency$(br)$(li)$(l)Vault XP Reduction$()$(li2)-25% Vault Experience$(li2)Only occurs in Sky Vaults
